author: Sholto Douglas @_sholtodouglas
text:
Extremely cool.
- How many years of AI progress are the small ideas (what if we try x+y because of z?) from the big ones (underlying theories)?
- How much scientific overhang is there from quickly discovering all the small things?
- What % of interesting protocols can be carried out by a benchtop robot? Where do we still need human dexterity?
- In 2 years, how bottlenecked will scientific progress be on giving the models feedback loops/real world affordances?
